long_description: A sleek and unobtrusive laptop carrier, the small-size STM Linear shoulder bag offers a convenient option for porting up to a 13 in. laptop without extra bulk or unnecessary features. Softly-lined dedicated laptop pocket is surrounded in high-density padding for ultimate protection. Tough, durable polyester fabric stands up to constant use. Front flap stays securely in place with a quick-release buckle; small zip pocket on flap for quick-access items. Softly-lined pockets underneath flap store additional accessories. Adjustable, padded shoulder strap on the STM Linear shoulder bag provides comfortable, hands-free carrying option. Luggage pass-through sleeve slides over rolling luggage pull handle for easy companion wheeling. Reflective tab enhances nighttime visibility.
short_description: A sleek and unobtrusive laptop carrier, the small-size STM Linear shoulder bag offers a convenient option for porting up to a 13 in. laptop without extra bulk or unnecessary features.
